name: Tower Defense Simulator 2016
description:
Tower Defense Simulator 2016 is a simple tower defense game that is fun for people of all ages.

An end of trimester University project that showed a lot more experimentation in UI design and polishing. Some assets within the game are from the assets store, such as the tower, the castle and the music.

  • Turrets created by Brackeys Tutorial
  • Music created by Kevin Macleoud: http://incompetech.com/
  • Sound FX from ZapSplat.com
  • Castle: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/50215

Controls:

  • Left click to navigate the UI and place towers
  • ESC and P to bring up the pause menu

Updates:

v1.01:

  • Added self-credit
